name: Tomato & Herb Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Saut√© diced tomato in olive oil in a pan (no onion or garlic).
Toss the cooked pasta with the tomato sauce and fresh basil.

name: Chickpea & Cucumber Salad
steps: Chop the cucumber and cherry tomatoes.
Mix all ingredients in a large bowl.
Dress with olive oil and lemon juice, then sprinkle with parsley.

name: Cheese & Herb Omelette
steps: Beat eggs with a splash of milk.
Melt butter in a pan over medium heat.
Pour in the eggs and cook gently.
Add cheese and herbs, then fold the omelette once the eggs are set.
